title: ISic000381. I.Sicily inscription 000381
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) ((·)) M(anibus) ((·)) s(acrum) ((·))
Valeria Thermitana ((·)) vixit
annos III mens(es) IIII dies VI
Valerius ((·)) Eutyches et Lysidia
5Thaumasie parentes fecerun(t)
filiae ((·)) piissimae
et sibi et suis

Apparatus criticus

Text of CIL

English translation

To the gods of the underworld, Valeria Thermitana lived for three years, four months, and six days. Valerius Eutyches and Lysidia Thaumasie, her parents, made this (tomb?) for their most dutiful daughter, and for themselves and their family.

commentary

bibliography

    10.7099 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
